Pickers: Adventures in Rust (BFG Edition)

Go on the ultimate treasure hunt in Pickers: Adventures in Rust! Find unusual and valuable items to fill your shop, Rusted Gold. Turn a quick profit or refurbish your finds to earn big money at auction. Collect and appraise valuable items and haggle with buyers in this unique Hidden Object game! Test your antique hunting talents and help Rusted Gold become incredibly successful in Pickers: Adventures in Rust!

Features:
- Refurbish valuable antiques
- Turn a tidy profit
- Go on a treasure hunt

System Requirements:

CPU: 2.5 GHz
RAM: 128 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 621 MB
